name: Land Registra
detail: He is in charge of establishing the final land title

name: Land Surveyor
detail: He is in charge of getting the exact coordinates of a piece of land

name: Notary
detail: He acts as a judge and drafts a contract to be signed by the buyer and the seller

name: The Buyer
detail: This is the person that wants to buy the land that is, the person on whose name a new land title will be established

name: The seller
detail: The person that wants to transfer his ownership to another person

name: FragMark
detail: The system that permits all this to be a sucess
